price: 9. En Wij hebben gezegend water uit de hemel naar beneden gestuurd vervolgens maken Wij daarmee tuinen en graan.
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
